meta.title: LAB SEVEN Features | Professional Battery Power for Production
meta.description: Silent battery power built for production. Indoor-safe 60A output, fast charging, real-time monitoring, and professional reliability.

hero.title: Features That Make a Difference on Set
hero.description: Every feature is designed to solve real production challenges. Silent operation. True 60A output. Professional monitoring. Built for the demands of professional production.

benefits.title: Why Production Teams Choose LAB SEVEN

items.title: Saves Money Over Generators
items.description: When you add fuel runs, fire watch, noise complaints, and slow wrap, generators cost more than the day rate suggests. LAB SEVEN eliminates hidden costs.

items.title: Works Everywhere Generators Can't
items.description: Indoor venues, noise-restricted zones, residential areas, and historic locations that prohibit generators. Silent operation opens impossible locations.

items.title: Professional Grade Reliability
items.description: LFP chemistry, BMS protection, real-time monitoring. Built for professional production with redundant safety systems and proven reliability.

features.title: How LAB SEVEN Solves Production Power Challenges

items.title: Truly Silent Operation
items.description: Zero noise during operation. No engine vibration, no exhaust fan, no compressor cycling. Your set stays quiet, your neighbors stay happy.

items.title: Indoor-Safe Zero Emissions
items.description: LFP battery chemistry produces zero emissions during operation. Safe for occupied indoor spaces, underground parking, and enclosed venues.

items.title: 60A Bates Output
items.description: True 60A output on professional Bates connector. Three independent 20A Edison circuits. Use your existing distribution boxes without adapters.

items.title: Fast Charging Options
items.description: 1-hour fast charge from 60A input, or 4-5 hours from standard 110V outlet. Charge overnight or rotate batteries during long productions.

items.title: Real-Time Monitoring
items.description: 4.3-inch color touchscreen shows voltage, current, power, state of charge, temperature, and runtime estimate. Bluetooth and WiFi remote monitoring.

items.title: Professional Safety Features
items.description: BMS with cell balancing, per-circuit breakers, thermal management, over-current protection. LFP chemistry is the safest lithium chemistry available.
